chunk: Directions: Apply 1 to 2 pumps onto clean face, 2-3x nights a week. Tingling upon application may occur.
book: 0075-Herbivore Botanicals Milky Way 10% AHA + Oat Soothing Exfoliating Serum

chunk: Warnings: Sunburn Alert: Use only as directed. Avoid contact with the eyes. Discontinue use immediately if irritation occurs and consult physician. Use a sunscreen daily while using this product. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied to sunscreen. Contact of the product with the skin
